title: Facebook-Based Creativity-Enhanced Science Learning Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Scientific Concepts and Digital Device Usage Skills
context.additional_context: Social learning environment establishment using smart devices and application of creativity assessment tools

learning_goals: Participating learners can create three or more science problem-solving scenarios using Facebook-based collaborative tools.
Learners can improve science experiment design proposals at least once by incorporating peer feedback.
Participating learners can produce and share two or more types of creative science content in an online collaborative environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
